WFRP4NPCGEN.options.select.title: Generate options
WFRP4NPCGEN.options.select.genPath.label: Folder
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithClassTra: Default selected value for the option 'include class trappings' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithCareerTr: Default selected value for the option 'include career trappings' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultGenerateMone: Default selected value for the option 'generate money on token creation' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultGenerateWeap: Default selected value for the option 'generate weapons on token creation' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultGenPath.name: Default generation path
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultGenPath.hint: Define the default generation path on actor directories
Species generations profiles allow you to specify for a species one or more generation profile wich contain generation path, image path and token image path
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithGenPathC: Default selected value for the option 'generate career name sub-folder' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithLinkedTo: Default selected value for the option 'link token with actor' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithInitialM: Default selected value for the option 'generate with money' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
WFRP4NPCGEN.settings.defaultWithInitialW: Default selected value for the option 'generate with weapons' on the options generation chooser when you generate a NPC
